sentences.en: Fluctuations in temperatures put their results oat by a mile.
sentences.cn: 由于温度起伏不定,他们的测验结果很不准确.

sentences.en: For example, you may not think a bagel tastes salty, but a typical 4-inch (10-centimeter) oat-bran bagel has about 532 mg of sodium, and even a slice of whole-wheat bread contains 132 mg of sodium.
sentences.cn: 例如百吉饼或许尝起来不咸，但一块普普通通的4英寸（10厘米）大的燕麦百吉饼却含将近532毫克的钠，而且即便一小块全麦面包也有132毫克钠。

sentences.en: Here is an oat cell carcinoma which is spreading along the bronchi.
sentences.cn: 正沿支气管蔓延的燕麦细胞癌.

sentences.en: In fact, that is, naked oats oats, oat flour or Y plane.
sentences.cn: 其实莜麦即燕麦, 莜面即燕麦粉.

sentences.en: Ingredients: natural moisturizing factor, vitamin, oat extract, m - tranexamic acid.
sentences.cn: 成份: 天然保湿因子 、 维他命 、 燕麦萃取 、 传明酸.

sentences.en: Instead of eating hunched pleasurably over a book, I look out of the window and chew every mouthful thoroughly, aware of every single oat and nut and dried bit of apple as it goes down.
sentences.cn: 送孩子们去学校后，我不再放松地边吃早饭边看书，而是盯着窗外，仔细地嚼着嘴里的食物：每一粒燕麦、每一颗坚果、每一片苹果干。
约翰对麦片粥的好处相信不疑.

sentences.en: Many people experienced a drop in their cholesterol levels when they consumed oat bran.
sentences.cn: 很多人食用燕麦麸后胆固醇水平下降了。

sentences.en: Mediterranean oat held to be progenitor of modern cultivated oat.
sentences.cn: 地中海地区燕麦,被认为是现代栽种燕麦的祖先.

sentences.en: Most small cell lung cancers are the oat cell type.
sentences.cn: 大部分小细胞肺癌属于燕麦细胞癌.

sentences.en: Oat bran became the darling of health freaks last year.
sentences.cn: 燕麦麸在去年成为保健狂人的最爱。

sentences.en: Oat bran protein concentrate was prepared by alkali extraction and acid precipitation.
sentences.cn: 以燕麦麸皮为原料,采用碱提酸沉法制备燕麦浓缩蛋白.

sentences.en: Oat bran protein concentrate was prepared through alkali extraction and acid precipitation.
sentences.cn: 采用碱提酸沉法制备了燕麦麸浓缩蛋白.

sentences.en: Organic oats, Corns, Wheat, Oat bran, Grape, Papaya, Banana, Pineapple , Inulin, Calciun carbonate, Citric acid, Probiotics, Natural fruit flavor.
sentences.cn: 有机燕麦 、 有机小麦 、 玉米 、 燕麦麸皮 、 葡萄 、 木瓜 、 香蕉 、 凤梨 、 菊芋纤维、碳酸钙 、 柠檬酸 、 益生菌 、 天然水果风味.

sentences.en: The boy spooned oat the to beans to his mouth.
sentences.cn: 这孩子用匙把黄豆舀出来放进嘴里.

sentences.en: The green green oat grass cover the ground.
The soldier hollowed oat a foxhole in the ground to lie in.
sentences.cn: 那士兵在地上挖了个散兵坑以便藏身.

trans.tran_en: an erect annual grass, Avena sativa, grown in temperate regions for its edible seed
